p: Lopinavir/ritonavir can have adverse effects such as increasing the concentration of cholesterol and triglycerides, in the case of subjects with diabetes or elevating the blood sugar concentration. In addition, as has been seen after treatment with an HIV treatment, conditions may change in the immune system as part of the inflammatory syndrome of immune reconstitution which sometimes happens when the immune system begins to recover [ 77]. The combination of drugs may also induce a lipodystrophy syndrome and increase bleeding episodes in people with hemophilia.
